description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Battleships?  Phaw!  Instead of trying to sink your opponent's ships, try to squish his or her worms?   A fun twist on this classic board game.  Squish all the worms in your opponent's garden before he can squish all of yours.  Happy stomping!
description.short: Battleships?  Phaw!  Instead of trying to sink your opponent's ships, try to squish his or her worms?   A fun twist on this classic board game.  Squish all the worms in your opponent's garden before he can squish all of yours.  Happy stomping!
